        public boolean setId(int id)
        if Player id == -1. Then the id can be set If Player id != -1 The Id cannot be set The purpose is to avoiding server assigning duplicated id to players and avoiding reassigning id to player
        ??:
        id -
        ??:
        True if id is changed. Otherwise, false
